alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lebanon; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:43PM EDT until July 02 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... North central Lebanon County in south central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Schuylkill County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 442 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tower City, moving east at 25 mph. This storm has a history of producing wind damage across northern Dauphin County. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Schuylkill Haven, Pine Grove, Tower City, Friedensburg, Lake Wynonah, Cressona, Auburn, Deer Lake, Ravine, Muir, Port Clinton and Orwin. This includes Interstate 81 from mile markers 95 to 105. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
